overview: A Fisher's Journey documents the travels of Dalston Samuel, a fisherman from Antigua, to Belize and Mexico for a fisher's exchange. Dal learns from the artisinal fishers there how they have been able to conserve their livelihoods and their way of life by working with scientists on conservation. Ultimately, A Fisher's Journey is a journey of the heart, revealing the hope and healing that come from working together.
title: A Fisher's Journey
